mapper.insert: insert into Device_Injection_maintance (id, device_Id, serial, region, submit_date, batch, longitude, latitude, work_content, injection_num, WoodStatus, Pic, Worker, Remarks, scanId,username,altitude,dataPrecision,province,city,area,town ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{batch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{woodstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scanid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username.jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{altitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dataPrecision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select * from Device_Injection_maintance WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT #{page1},#{page2};
